name: shell-ai
description: Shell AI is a simple CLI tool that utilizes Open AI to provide code suggestions directly in your terminal

scripts.dev: export CUSTOMER_PORTAL='https://billing.stripe.com/p/login/test_dR63fI3o7b7d39S7ss' SIGNUP_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/signup' SUGGEST_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/suggest' AUTH_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/auth' REFRESH_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/refresh' SUBSCRIBE_URL='http://localhost:3000/api/subscribe' && npx tsc && npm install -g . && shell-ai signup
scripts.prepack: unset CUSTOMER_PORTAL SIGNUP_URL SUGGEST_URL AUTH_URL REFRESH_URL SUBSCRIBE_URL && npx tsc
scripts.prepublish: unset CUSTOMER_PORTAL SIGNUP_URL SUGGEST_URL AUTH_URL REFRESH_URL SUBSCRIBE_URL && npx tsc

author: Jack Thomson
